body:
Which version of Electron are you seeing this ? with the latest i get the expected output.

```
‚ùØ ../shell/out/D/electron ./dialog-app
[14669:0907/215331:ERROR:browser_main_loop.cc(189)] Running without the SUID sandbox! See https://code.google.com/p/chromium/wiki/LinuxSUIDSandboxDevelopment for more information on developing with the sandbox on.
[14690:0907/215331:INFO:renderer_main.cc(200)] Renderer process started
[14669:0907/215333:INFO:CONSOLE(10)] "open child button clicked. sending child:open ipc msg to main process", source: file:///home/robo/github/hello-atom/dialog-app/b.html (10)
main.js :: ipc msg child:open received
main.js :: create a new child window
[14704:0907/215333:INFO:renderer_main.cc(200)] Renderer process started
main.js :: new child window loaded. sending url to the child window.
[14669:0907/215333:INFO:CONSOLE(12)] "child :: url received: http://domain.tld", source: file:///home/robo/github/hello-atom/dialog-app/child.html (12)
[14716:0907/215333:INFO:renderer_main.cc(200)] Renderer process started
[14723:0907/215333:INFO:renderer_main.cc(200)] Renderer process started
[14669:0907/215333:INFO:CONSOLE(26)] "child :: dom-ready fired - about:blank", source: file:///home/robo/github/hello-atom/dialog-app/child.html (26)
[14669:0907/215333:INFO:CONSOLE(22)] "child :: finished loading - about:blank", source: file:///home/robo/github/hello-atom/dialog-app/child.html (22)
[14669:0907/215334:INFO:CONSOLE(17)] "child :: failed to load - about:blank", source: file:///home/robo/github/hello-atom/dialog-app/child.html (17)
[14669:0907/215334:INFO:CONSOLE(18)] "e : {"errorCode":-105,"errorDescription":""}", source: file:///home/robo/github/hello-atom/dialog-app/child.html (18)
[14669:0907/215334:INFO:CONSOLE(26)] "child :: dom-ready fired - http://domain.tld/", source: file:///home/robo/github/hello-atom/dialog-app/child.html (26)
[14669:0907/215334:INFO:CONSOLE(22)] "child :: finished loading - http://domain.tld/", source: file:///home/robo/github/hello-atom/dialog-app/child.html (22)

```

the finish-load and dom-ready event are fired for the unreachable url because it loads default network error [page](https://code.google.com/p/chromium/codesearch#chromium/src/content/public/common/url_constants.cc&q=chromewebdata&sq=package:chromium&l=55), if you check `window.location.href` of the webview it will be

```
"data:text/html,chromewebdata"
```

anyways `webview.src` is highly unreliable here to test the url realted to the events, maybe `fail-load` and `finish-load` should carry corresponding url as payload @zcbenz ?
In latest electron I'm not able to reproduce, seems that it gets fixed by some other commits.
